name: Mango Bruschetta
author: Justin Aleo
summary: This bruschetta is made with mango, basil, and Romano cheese, which yields an interesting combination of sweet, sour, and peppery flavors.
ingredients: 1 (1 pound) loaf French bread, cut into 1/2 inch pieces
directions: Arrange French bread slices in a single layer on a large baking sheet
Broil in the preheated oven 1 to 2 minutes per side, until lightly toasted
In a medium bowl, mix mango and fresh basil
Top each bread slice with equal amounts of the mango and basil mixture
Sprinkle with Romano cheese, adjusting the amount to taste
Broil 2 to 3 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and lightly browned
